resources.string:
This is the game of Transitions. In it you try to transition positions of purple and green colored balls.

 Tapping a purple colored ball will either move it right to an empty space, or jump it right over a green ball to an empty space.

Tapping a green colored ball will either move it left to an empty space, or jump it left over a purple ball to an empty space.
Play continues until either you complete the transitions, or you run out of valid moves.\n\nThat\'s as easy as it gets !

Transitions is a simple game, based on code ported from an early terminal-style computer, the DEC-PDP-8, written in BASIC and ported to the Apple II.
